channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Samsung Issues Critical Update For Millions Of Galaxy Users
item.description: This update is more alarming than it seems…

item.title: The lazy jugglers
item.description: The best jugglers don’t seem to be trying very hard. That’s because they understand what the work involves, and they don’t confuse effort with results...

item.title: Fighter Reveals UFC’s Harsh Post-Fight Rule
item.description: Payton Talbott, one of the biggest winners at UFC 303, revealed a bizarre rule the UFC has that seems harsh toward fights.

item.title: Aerodynamic figureheads

item.title: UFC CEO Dana White Says He Will ‘Never’ OK Fan-Requested Weight Class
item.description: The UFC's Dana White isn't budging when it comes to his unwillingness to open up a 165-pound division in the promotion.
